text: There are two De Morgan’s laws that can be readily verified by constructing truth tables for the LHS and RHS.
The NOT of $( A + B )$ is equal to the AND of the complements of $A$ and $B$ .
The NOT of $( A . B )$ is equal to the OR of the complements of $A$ and $B$ .
Example 5 Prove the consensus theorem: $X . Y + \overline { { { X } } } . Z + Y . Z = X . Y + \overline { { { X } } } . Z .$ .
Prove the theorem: $( X + Z ) . ( { \overline { { X } } } + Y ) = X . Y + { \overline { { X } } } . Z$ .
